name: Jonathan Singletary
description:
“As Time Stood Still,” curated by Luis Santana and co-curated by Kiara Cristina Ventura, is an NFT  photography solo exhibition highlighting the works of artist and documentarian Luis Santana. Launching at the Mynt Gallery, an experimental NFT Lab and art gallery in Chelsea at High Line Nine, the exhibition is Santana’s first NYC solo exhibition, and is the artists' NFT genesis drop.  The show centers around 18 pieces from framed black and white photographs to blue mixed media cyanotype works on paper and canvas that are connected to NFTs.


Upon purchasing this NFT, you will receive a physical print.  To authenticate the purchase of this piece, you can reach out to the photographers studio to claim your print: luissantanaphoto@gmail.com. 

Type: 
Cyanotype on Fabriano Paper
8x10
Cyanotype
